name: Watercase
description:
THE BATTLE FOR AWESOMENESS BEGINS AT SEA

In a world... where a horrible epidemic has turned everyone into socks, one sock will change the fate of this world. Stranded on a mysterious underwater floating island, and missing its other pair, killer scissors attack the sock. But it is not easily swayed. It will stop at nothing to learn the truth. 

DISCLAIMER: This was the first game I made and it is bad. Like really bad. But it is playable, and if you want to see the weird game that was built in a few days, feel free to!

CREATED BY: Kaleb Nekumanesh, Jose Mares, Luis Lopez, with assistance from John Saechao.
